text:
When I try to load a servlet or a jsp-page, I get an application error popup 
from inetinfo.exe, saying: The instruction at "0x10003d50" referenced memory 
at "0x10003d50". The memory could not be "read".
I'm using Win2000 Pro (without any SP's) and the IIS 5.0 on HP Omnibook 6000. I 
tried this with both 3.2.1 and 3.2.2 versions of Tomcat.
This could be some problem in my OS though, I have another box with identical 
setup running perfectly..
creator: tjjalava@cc.hut.fi

text: This not a tomcat bug, may be a config problem in your setups..
creator: nacho@apache.org
